preqs: Students must have completed one of the following units: ETC2420, ETC2520 or MTH2222 before undertaking this unit

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ETC2420, ETC2520, ETC5242, ETC5252, MTH2222} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ETC2520, ETC5252} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ETC2520} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: To provide a further grounding in the mathematics and statistics of short term insurance risk.
